customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Cypress Reports: MISSING - TM4J-Key-Missing-In-Cypress - TM4J key NOT found in any Cypress run reports  (SDET/QA)

inline.description:
1. Click channel name ➜ Edit Channel Header (for mobile, you must tap Edit Channel from the channel info screen)
  2. Add / edit header to start with a quote, such as the following, and save:
    > This is a quote in the header
inline.expectedResult:
• Quotes icon should be fully visible, not cut off, then followed by as much of the text as will fit (depending on the width of the window)
  • RN Apps: Tap channel name to view channel info and should see markdown quotes indicator with text

customFields.Important notes about this step: RN Apps: Tap channel name to view channel info and should see markdown quotes indicator with text

inline.description:
1. Copy the channel header info from a channel you are able to edit
  2. Add a markdown image to the start of the text — i.e., ![Alt text](Image_URL) — and paste it into the channel header of a test channel you've set up
inline.expectedResult:
• Channel header inline image displays as expected
  • System messages as in the attachments does not wrap

customFields.Related ticket(s): Web: Fix inline markdown images paragraphs styles — MM-21284
